verbs.description: [ARG1: atiku s east rift] [V: deepens] [ARGM-GOL: over single term request] the idea is to pave the way for a southeasterner to succeed him in 2023 but atiku who believes his choice of mr peter obi from the zone is enough as an expression of his respect for the people is not keen on doing one term port harcourt dubai peter obi peoples democratic party sahara reporters pdp southeast alhaji atiku abubakar president mr peter obi atiku abubakar atiku enugu
